==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=维}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|糸|t1=thread|隹|c1=s|c2=p|ls=psc|no_och2=1}} – to tie fast, to maintain.

The original pronunciation of {{och-l|隹|tr=*ɢʷi}} was lost after the classical period, but can still be seen in other characters of the phonetic series:
* {{och-l|惟|to think}},
* {{och-l|唯|only}},
* {{och-l|雖|although}},
* {{och-l|帷|curtain, screen}} and
* {{och-l|淮|Huai River}}.
